languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Ксеносы{/g}, тревожившие сектор и раньше, в последние десятилетия активизировались, в их прежде хаотичных налетах видны логика и системность. Даже две стаи Космических волков, — благословенных {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}космодесантников{/g}, призванных моим именем — не умерили их интерес к Простору".

traits.locale_text: "Что Архонт Кабала Опустошительной бури высунулась из Комморры впервые за сотню лет, чтобы лично наблюдать кражу одной из звезд сектора, и с тех пор покидала свое логово не менее пяти раз? Что похищения солнц, совершаемые ими, не являются обычным грабежом, но имеют строгие и непонятные критерии и являются частью некоего грандиозного проекта?"

languages.text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is a logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marines{/g} summoned in my name — did not cool their interest in the Expanse."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Ксеносы{/g}, тревожившие сектор и раньше, в последние десятилетия активизировались, в их прежде хаотичных налетах видны логика и системность. Даже две стаи Космических волков, — благословенных {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}космодесантников{/g}, призванных моим именем — не умерили их интерес к Простору".

traits.locale_text: "The xenos, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed Space Marine summoned in my name — did not tone down their interest in the Koronus."

"The xenos, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed Space Marine summoned in my name — did not tone down their interest in the Koronus."

"The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is a logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marine{/g} summoned in my name — did not cool their interest in the Koronus."

"The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is a logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marine{/g} summoned in my name — did not cool their interest in the Koronus."

"The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is a logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marines{/g} summoned in my name — did not cool their interest in the Expanse."

languages.text: 「以前から星域で問題を起こしていた{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}が、この2、30年で活動を広げている。また、以前の無秩序な襲撃には理屈と意図がある。スペースウルフ、つまり、祝福を受けた{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}スペースマリーン{/g}の二隊を私の名において召集したが、それさえ異種族の勢力をエクスパンスから削ぐことはできなかった」
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is a logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marines{/g} summoned in my name — did not cool their interest in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「以前から星域で問題を起こしていた{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}が、この2、30年で活動を広げている。また、以前の無秩序な襲撃には理屈と意図がある。スペースウルフ、つまり、祝福を受けた{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}スペースマリーン{/g}の二隊を私の名において召集したが、それさえ異種族の勢力をエクスパンスから削ぐことはできなかった」

languages.original_text: "The xenos, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is a logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed Space Marines summoned in my name — did not cool their interest in the Expanse."

languages.text: “那些{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}之前就在这片星区里制造过不少麻烦，而在过去的几十年里，他们的侵袭越发频繁，原本毫无章法的袭击也开始变得越来越周密。就算我以我的名义派出了受帝皇祝福{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}星际战士{/g}，两群太空野狼，也没能浇灭他们对扩区的热情。”
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is a logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marines{/g} summoned in my name — did not cool their interest in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “那些{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}之前就在这片星区里制造过不少麻烦，而在过去的几十年里，他们的侵袭越发频繁，原本毫无章法的袭击也开始变得越来越周密。就算我以我的名义派出了受帝皇祝福{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}星际战士{/g}，两群太空野狼，也没能浇灭他们对扩区的热情。”

languages.text: «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, que ya habían causado problemas en el sector anteriormente, han ampliado sus actividades en las últimas décadas, y sus otrora caóticas incursiones ahora son lógicas y metódicas. Ni siquiera la llegada de dos jaurías de Lobos Espaciales, benditos {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Marines Espaciales{/g} que acudieron en mi nombre, ha bastado para templar su interés por la Extensión».
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is a logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marines{/g} summoned in my name — did not cool their interest in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, que ya habían causado problemas en el sector anteriormente, han ampliado sus actividades en las últimas décadas, y sus otrora caóticas incursiones ahora son lógicas y metódicas. Ni siquiera la llegada de dos jaurías de Lobos Espaciales, benditos {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Marines Espaciales{/g} que acudieron en mi nombre, ha bastado para templar su interés por la Extensión».

languages.text: « Les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, qui n'en sont pas à leur premier coup d'essai dans ce secteur, ont développé leurs activités ces dernières décennies. Leurs raids, qui n'étaient autrefois que désordre et chaos, suivent désormais une méthode et une logique implacable. Deux meutes de Space Wolves, des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marines{/g} invoqués en mon nom, n'ont pas suffi à calmer leurs ardeurs. »
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is a logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marines{/g} summoned in my name — did not cool their interest in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, qui n'en sont pas à leur premier coup d'essai dans ce secteur, ont développé leurs activités ces dernières décennies. Leurs raids, qui n'étaient autrefois que désordre et chaos, suivent désormais une méthode et une logique implacable. Deux meutes de Space Wolves, des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marines{/g} invoqués en mon nom, n'ont pas suffi à calmer leurs ardeurs. »

languages.text: "Die {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, die schon früher im Sektor für Unruhe gesorgt haben, haben ihre Aktivitäten in den letzten Jahrzehnten verstärkt, und ihre vormals chaotischen Überfälle folgen jetzt einer Logik und haben Methode. Sogar zwei Rudel der Space Wolves – gesegnete {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marines{/g}, die in meinem Namen gerufen wurden – konnten ihr Interesse an der Ausdehnung nicht schmälern."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is a logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marines{/g} summoned in my name — did not cool their interest in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Die {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, die schon früher im Sektor für Unruhe gesorgt haben, haben ihre Aktivitäten in den letzten Jahrzehnten verstärkt, und ihre vormals chaotischen Überfälle folgen jetzt einer Logik und haben Methode. Sogar zwei Rudel der Space Wolves – gesegnete {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marines{/g}, die in meinem Namen gerufen wurden – konnten ihr Interesse an der Ausdehnung nicht schmälern."

languages.text: "Sektörde daha önce sorun yaratan {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g}, etkinliklerini son birkaç on yıldır artırdı. Eskiden yaptıkları kaotik baskınları artık bir mantığa ve metoda oturttular. Hatta adıma çağrılan kutsanmış {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Uzay Piyadeleri{/g}, yani iki Uzay Kurdu sürüsü bile Enginlik'teki faaliyetlerini yavaşlatmadı."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who have caused trouble in the sector before, have expanded their activities in the last few decades, and there is a logic and method to their previously chaotic raids. Even two packs of Space Wolves — blessed {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Space Marines{/g} summoned in my name — did not cool their interest in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Sektörde daha önce sorun yaratan {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g}, etkinliklerini son birkaç on yıldır artırdı ve eskiden yaptıkları kaotik baskınların artık bir mantığı ve metodu var. Hatta adıma çağrılan kutsanmış {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Uzay Piyadeleri{/g}, yani iki Uzay Kurdu sürüsü bile Enginlik'teki faaliyetlerini yavaşlatmadı."
